\ left / \! \ raisebox { - 1ex} { $ \ mathrm { L} \ bullet \ mathrm { day} $} \ right. \ right)} \ times 100 $ $ \ end { document} CO2conversion efficiency = CO2phaseImLLdayCO2in biogas phaseIImLLdayCO2phaseImLLday100 Sample collection For metatranscriptomic analyses, triplicate samples ( ~ 30mL each) were collected from R1 and R3 at steady - state reactor operation of phase I ( i. e., period with stable biogas production with a daily variation lower than 10% for at least 5days), and after 1week from the H2 injection ( phase II).
